text:
SOLUCIÓN DE UN SISTEMA DE 3×3 POR GAUSS-JORDAN (Parte 2)

Gauss-Jordan 3\times3 paore [imath] \cdots [/imath]\n[imath] \left\{\begin{array}{c}{2 x-y+z=2} \\ {3 x+y-2 z=9} \\ {-x+2 y+5 z=-5}\end{array}\right. [/imath][imath]{2 x-y+z=2} [/imath] [imath] {3 x+y-2 z=9} [/imath] [imath] {-x+2 y+5 z=-5}[/imath]
